item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE ! " data_animation="fadeInUp" data_delay="300" enable_delimiter="" color_scheme="gradient_scheme2" style="heading_style1" title_font_options="tag:h2|font_size:70|line_height:80|letter_spacing:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:div|color:%23333333|letter_spacing:3" heading_margin="margin-bottom:20" title_responsive="font_size_mobile:35|line_height_mobile:50|letter_spacing_mobile:1"]5/5 Amazing Reviews[/apress_heading][ultimate_spacer height="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by=" katelynjb7680" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]The best I have used in recent times, Bravo[/apress_testimonial][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by=" rockstar_images " designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbackgroundcolor="#f7f7f7" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]A brilliant theme - offers complexity in design but is very easy to use. The best theme I ever bought here on themeforest.net, a no-brainer.[/apress_testimonial][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by="KristenSam" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]A wonderful theme here! I am coming off of The7, been using it over and over for years but wanted to try something newer (and cheaper) and Apress hit the mark! I'll definitely be using this for my clients. AND - support has been top-notch. [/apress_testimonial][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by="Sunshin27au" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbackgroundcolor="#f7f7f7" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]The few times I had to contact customer support, I was impressed with the speed of the reply and the content of the reply. Amazing theme, loads of possibilities.[/apress_testimonial][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by="950103" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]Beautiful design and Plenty of customization options. Truly a multipurpose theme, suit for any kind of website.[/apress_testimonial][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by=" KevinWijnbergen" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbackgroundcolor="#f7f7f7" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]Amazing features, responsive, and blazingfast support! All included in this amazing price![/apress_testimonial][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by=" aimanmoe" designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbackgroundcolor="" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]Great theme. As I designer, it has enough flexibility to create designs to my own specifications without having to use any code. The developer seems to be on top of producing updates when necessary. It is no wonder that it is so popular. Highly recommended.[/apress_testimonial][apress_testimonial testimonialstyle="testimonials_style2" rating_option="100%" by="emarketnet " designation="Themeforest User" testimonialbackgroundcolor="#f7f7f7" testimonialbordercolor="#eaeaea" testimonialauthorcolor="#333333"]Great theme, You get value for your money.
